# Create a Thermokarst Map for Council

## Load Packages
```{r}
library(thermokarstdetection)
library(raster)
library(terra)
```

## Load Data
```{r}
elev <- trim(rast('../council_tower/lidar_rasters/CNCL_GEG_01M.tif'))
plot(elev)
```

## Run Thermokarst Detection
This will be very slow!

```{r}

tk <- tk_detect(raster(elev))
```
